definition: secondary/auxiliary/deputy/assistant/vice-/abbr. for 副詞|副词 adverb/classifier for pairs, sets of things & facial expressions

sentences.english: EA is oxidized completely and no partially oxidized side-products are formed over the catalysts.
sentences.chinese: 乙酸乙酯在催化剂上完全被氧化且无副产物生成。

sentences.english: Sweet potato residue is the by-product of sweet potato starch process.
sentences.chinese: 红薯渣为红薯淀粉加工过程中的副产物。

sentences.english: The compound stabilizer of water is synthetized from the by product in production of acetyl chloride.
sentences.chinese: 采用乙酰氯副产物为原料合成复合水质稳定剂。

sentences.english: The excess amine is employed to selectively neutralize by-product acid as the amine salt.
sentences.chinese: 使用该过量的胺将副产物酸选择性中和为胺盐。

sentences.english: At present, enhanced coagulation is the best available technology to control DBPs.
sentences.chinese: 强化混凝是目前控制消毒副产物的最佳可行性技术。

sentences.english: The effluent is then sent to the separation section to remove the light by-product.
sentences.chinese: 流出物再送到分离段以脱除轻质副产物。

sentences.english: Sodium metaborate is a by-product from deoxidation of sodium borohydride.
sentences.chinese: 偏硼酸钠是硼氢化钠的还原副产物。

sentences.english: Up to now, there are more than 200 DBPs have been detected.
sentences.chinese: 目前已检测出消毒副产物有200多种。

sentences.english: Sewage sludge is a by-product of the wastewater-treatment system.
sentences.chinese: 污泥是污水处理系统产生的副产物。

sentences.english: They are the byproducts of another system.
sentences.chinese: 它们是另一个机制的副产物。

sentences.english: The main by-product during the production of acrylonitrile is acetonitrile.
sentences.chinese: 乙腈是丙烯氨氧化制丙烯腈的主要副产物，用途很小。

sentences.english: Corn protein powder is the main one of by-products that produce the starch in corn wet-milling process.
sentences.chinese: 玉米蛋白粉是玉米湿法生产淀粉的主要副产物之一。

sentences.english: Skimmed milk powder is a by-product of butter production.
sentences.chinese: 脱脂奶粉是出产黄油的副产物。

sentences.english: Phthalic anhydride residue is the by product from oxidation of naphthalene oro xylene.
sentences.chinese: 苯酐渣系萘氧化或邻二甲苯氧化的副产物。

sentences.english: From these results, it can be concluded that all the byproducts of purple potato starch extraction have a notable antihyperglycemic effect.
sentences.chinese: 提取紫薯淀粉后的副产物均有明显降血压作用。

sentences.english: They instead looked for a by-product of cancer.
sentences.chinese: 相反，他们关注的是癌症的副产物。

definition: a derivative (complex product derived from simpler source material)
